message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its immense potential value, I believe a starting price of $1,100,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to commit up to $950,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $950,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,025,000?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to increase my offer beyond $975,000. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
